de.javakaffee.web.msm
Interface SessionAttributesTranscoder

All Known Implementing Classes:
JavaSerializationTranscoder
public interface SessionAttributesTranscoder

The SessionAttributesTranscoder is responsible for serializing/deserializing the session attributes map to/from a byte array.

Method Summary
 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> deserializeAttributes(byte[] data)
          Deserialize the given byte array to session attributes.
 byte[] serializeAttributes(MemcachedBackupSession session, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> attributes)
          Serialize the given attributes to a byte array.
 

Method Detail

serializeAttributes

byte[] serializeAttributes(MemcachedBackupSession session,
                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> attributes)
Serialize the given attributes to a byte array. The provided session is the session the attributes were retrieved from. The serialized byte[] can be deserialized using deserializeAttributes(byte[]).

Parameters:
session - the session that owns the given attributes.
attributes - the attributes to serialize.
Returns:
a byte array representing the serialized attributes.

deserializeAttributes

java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> deserializeAttributes(byte[] data)
Deserialize the given byte array to session attributes. The map implementation should be a ConcurrentHashMap as this is the implementation currently used by the StandardSession.

Parameters:
data - the serialized attributes
Returns:
the deserialized attributes
